com.konakart.appif

Interface CreateOrderOptionsIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreateOrderOptions

    public interface CreateOrderOptionsIf
    An object used to contain options used when creating an order from an array of basket items.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isCopyBasketCustomFields

        boolean isCopyBasketCustomFields()
        When this boolean is set, all the custom fields of a basket item are automatically copied to the custom fields of the OrderProduct object in the order.
        Returns:
        Returns the copyBasketCustomFields.

      • setCopyBasketCustomFields

        void setCopyBasketCustomFields(boolean copyBasketCustomFields)
        When this boolean is set, all the custom fields of a basket item are automatically copied to the custom fields of the OrderProduct object in the order.
        Parameters:
        copyBasketCustomFields - The copyBasketCustomFields to set.

      • isUseDefaultCustomer

        boolean isUseDefaultCustomer()
        This boolean is set so that an order can be created before a customer has logged in to the application. We may want to do this to calculate the order totals so that they can be displayed in the edit cart screen to give additional information to a customer such as shipping charges, discounts etc. Since we don't have the details of the customer, the address of a "default customer" is used. The default customer can be configured in the Admin App. When this boolean is set, the session parameter can be set to null.
        Returns:
        Returns the useDefaultCustomer.

      • setUseDefaultCustomer

        void setUseDefaultCustomer(boolean useDefaultCustomer)
        This boolean is set so that an order can be created before a customer has logged in to the application. We may want to do this to calculate the order totals so that they can be displayed in the edit cart screen to give additional information to a customer such as shipping charges, discounts etc. Since we don't have the details of the customer, the address of a "default customer" is used. The default customer can be configured in the Admin App. When this boolean is set, the session parameter can be set to null.
        Parameters:
        useDefaultCustomer - The useDefaultCustomer to set.

      • isUseWishListShippingAddr

        boolean isUseWishListShippingAddr()
        If any one of the basket items, has a valid wish list id, then we use the address of the wish list as the shipping address.
        Returns:
        the useWishListShippingAddr

      • isCalcQuantityForBundles

        boolean isCalcQuantityForBundles()
        When set to true the quantity available for a product is calculated by reading the quantities of the products within the bundle. If set to false, when updating the inventory the quantities of the bundled products will not be updated.
        Returns:
        the calcQuantityForBundles

      • setCalcQuantityForBundles

        void setCalcQuantityForBundles(boolean calcQuantityForBundles)
        When set to true the quantity available for a product is calculated by reading the quantities of the products within the bundle. If set to false, when updating the inventory the quantities of the bundled products will not be updated.
        Parameters:
        calcQuantityForBundles - the calcQuantityForBundles to set

        Parameters:
        giftCertCode - the giftCertCode to set

      • isPopulateAvailableShippingQuotes

        boolean isPopulateAvailableShippingQuotes()
        When set to true the order is populated with an array of available shipping quotes. The default value is false. The selected shipping quote for the order is either the first in the list or if shippingModuleCode and shippingServiceCode are set, it attempts to find these codes in the list of available shipping quotes and if found it uses this quote as the selected shipping quote.
        Returns:
        the populateAvailableShippingQuotes

      • setPopulateAvailableShippingQuotes

        void setPopulateAvailableShippingQuotes(boolean populateAvailableShippingQuotes)
        When set to true the order is populated with an array of available shipping quotes. The default value is false. The selected shipping quote for the order is either the first in the list or if shippingModuleCode and shippingServiceCode are set, it attempts to find these codes in the list of available shipping quotes and if found it uses this quote as the selected shipping quote.
        Parameters:
        populateAvailableShippingQuotes - the populateAvailableShippingQuotes to set

      • getShippingModuleCode

        java.lang.String getShippingModuleCode()
        The code of the shipping module to set for the order (e.g. flat, free, ups). This is only used if populateAvailableShippingQuotes is set to true.
        Returns:
        the shippingModuleCode

      • setShippingModuleCode

        void setShippingModuleCode(java.lang.String shippingModuleCode)
        The code of the shipping module to set for the order (e.g. flat, free, ups). This is only used if populateAvailableShippingQuotes is set to true.
        Parameters:
        shippingModuleCode - the shippingModuleCode to set

      • getShippingServiceCode

        java.lang.String getShippingServiceCode()
        The service code of the shipping module to set for the order. A service code may be defined for shipping modules that return multiple quotes (e.g. overnight, 2-day etc.).This is only used if populateAvailableShippingQuotes is set to true.
        Returns:
        the shippingServiceCode

      • setShippingServiceCode

        void setShippingServiceCode(java.lang.String shippingServiceCode)
        The service code of the shipping module to set for the order. A service code may be defined for shipping modules that return multiple quotes (e.g. overnight, 2-day etc.).This is only used if populateAvailableShippingQuotes is set to true.
        Parameters:
        shippingServiceCode - the shippingServiceCode to set

      • isPopulateAvailablePaymentGateways

        boolean isPopulateAvailablePaymentGateways()
        When set to true, the order is populated with an array of available payment gateways. The default value is false. The selected payment module for the order is either the first in the list or if paymentModuleCode and paymentModuleSubCode are set, it attempts to find these codes in the list of available payment gateways and if found it uses this gateway as the selected payment gateway.
        Returns:
        the populateAvailablePaymentGateways

      • setPopulateAvailablePaymentGateways

        void setPopulateAvailablePaymentGateways(boolean populateAvailablePaymentGateways)
        When set to true, the order is populated with an array of available payment gateways. The default value is false. The selected payment module for the order is either the first in the list or if paymentModuleCode and paymentModuleSubCode are set, it attempts to find these codes in the list of available payment gateways and if found it uses this gateway as the selected payment gateway.
        Parameters:
        populateAvailablePaymentGateways - the populateAvailablePaymentGateways to set

      • getPaymentModuleCode

        java.lang.String getPaymentModuleCode()
        The code of the payment module to set for the order (e.g. cod, worldpay, paypal). This is only used if populateAvailablePaymentGateways is set to true.
        Returns:
        the paymentModuleCode

      • setPaymentModuleCode

        void setPaymentModuleCode(java.lang.String paymentModuleCode)
        The code of the payment module to set for the order (e.g. cod, worldpay, paypal). This is only used if populateAvailablePaymentGateways is set to true.
        Parameters:
        paymentModuleCode - the paymentModuleCode to set

      • getPaymentModuleSubCode

        java.lang.String getPaymentModuleSubCode()
        The sub code of the payment module to set for the order. This is only used if populateAvailablePaymentGateways is set to true. A subCode is used when a payment module supports multiple payment methods.
        Returns:
        the paymentModuleSubCode

      • setPaymentModuleSubCode

        void setPaymentModuleSubCode(java.lang.String paymentModuleSubCode)
        The sub code of the payment module to set for the order. This is only used if populateAvailablePaymentGateways is set to true. A subCode is used when a payment module supports multiple payment methods.
        Parameters:
        paymentModuleSubCode - the paymentModuleSubCode to set

      • isPopulateOrderTotals

        boolean isPopulateOrderTotals()
        When set to true, the order is populated with its order total modules.
        Returns:
        the populateOrderTotals

      • setPopulateOrderTotals

        void setPopulateOrderTotals(boolean populateOrderTotals)
        When set to true, the order is populated with its order total modules.
        Parameters:
        populateOrderTotals - the populateOrderTotals to set

      • isGetImages

        boolean isGetImages()
        When creating the order we attach a product object to each order product. If getImages is set to true, we attach a ProductImages object to the product, which contains a list of image names available for it.
        Returns:
        the getImages

      • setGetImages

        void setGetImages(boolean getImages)
        When creating the order we attach a product object to each order product. If getImages is set to true, we attach a ProductImages object to the product, which contains a list of image names available for it.
        Parameters:
        getImages - the getImages to set

      • getInventoryUpdateExcludeProdTypes

        int[] getInventoryUpdateExcludeProdTypes()
        Used to define product types that are excluded from inventory updates. Used in the updateInventoryWithOptions() API call. Valid product types are:
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.PHYSICAL_PRODUCT
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.DIGITAL_DOWNLOAD
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.FREE_SHIPPING
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.BUNDLE_PRODUCT_TYPE
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.FREE_SHIPPING_BUNDLE_PRODUCT_TYPE
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.GIFT_CERTIFICATE_PRODUCT_TYPE
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.BOOKABLE_PRODUCT_TYPE
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.VIRTUAL_PRODUCT_TYPE
        Returns:
        the inventoryUpdateExcludeProdTypes

      • setInventoryUpdateExcludeProdTypes

        void setInventoryUpdateExcludeProdTypes(int[] inventoryUpdateExcludeProdTypes)
        Used to define product types that are excluded from inventory updates. Used in the updateInventoryWithOptions() API call. Valid product types are:
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.PHYSICAL_PRODUCT
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.DIGITAL_DOWNLOAD
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.FREE_SHIPPING
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.BUNDLE_PRODUCT_TYPE
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.FREE_SHIPPING_BUNDLE_PRODUCT_TYPE
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.GIFT_CERTIFICATE_PRODUCT_TYPE
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.BOOKABLE_PRODUCT_TYPE
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.VIRTUAL_PRODUCT_TYPE
        Parameters:
        inventoryUpdateExcludeProdTypes - the inventoryUpdateExcludeProdTypes to set

      • getCurrencyCode

        java.lang.String getCurrencyCode()
        The currency code of the currency to be used for the order. If null then the store default currency is used
        Returns:
        the currencyCode

      • setCurrencyCode

        void setCurrencyCode(java.lang.String currencyCode)
        The currency code of the currency to be used for the order. If null then the store default currency is used
        Parameters:
        currencyCode - the currencyCode to set
